sentences.english: Legend has it that there was a devil in Dynasty of Dong Han.
sentences.chinese: 相傳，在東漢時期有一妖怪爲禍人間。

sentences.english: There's something inside us that loves a good monster.
sentences.chinese: 在我們人類內心深處，喜歡有一個好的妖怪。

sentences.english: Monkey, seeing that the boy was actually a demon in disguise, told his master not to bother.
sentences.chinese: 悟空認出那是妖怪變的，叫師父少管閒事。

sentences.english: Fishermen and sailors sometimes claim to have seen monsters in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 漁夫和水手們有時聲稱自己看到過海里的妖怪。

sentences.english: No hobgoblin appeared, although a black cat did try to cross my path.
sentences.chinese: 沒有妖怪出現，只有一隻黑貓企圖橫穿馬路。

sentences.english: I found out he's talking just about a new Pokemon game.
sentences.chinese: 結果我發現他是在說最新的口袋妖怪遊戲。

sentences.english: Upper Seasons Lake is a mythic hiding place of fire-breathing monsters.
sentences.chinese: 上季節海是神話中吐火妖怪藏身之地。

sentences.english: Once the lens turn and a devil with disgustingly dirty whole body appear on the hill path.
sentences.chinese: 鏡頭一轉，一個渾身髒兮兮的妖怪出現在山路上。

sentences.english: There was a thunderclap, and the genie declared, "Your wish has been granted."
sentences.chinese: 在滾滾雷聲中，妖怪宣佈，“你的願望已經實現了。”

sentences.english: There was an ash tree in the forest which was thought to be a monster.
sentences.chinese: 森林中有一株被認爲是妖怪的白蠟樹。

sentences.english: Little monsters, please discuss and, if you can, tell us what that means.
sentences.chinese: 小妖怪們，麻煩幫我們解釋一下爺爺到底想說神馬。

sentences.english: In this room there are many cave claws and kergrim fighting eachother.
sentences.chinese: 房間內有許多洞穴妖怪和地穴怪正在相互打鬥。

sentences.english: In some stories, genies are always found inside a lamp or bottle.
sentences.chinese: 在一些故事裏，燈裏或瓶子中總是裝有妖怪。

sentences.english: “Gobbledegook” sounds like the name of a monster in a fairy tale.
sentences.chinese: 這個詞聽起來像是神話傳說中某個妖怪的名字。

sentences.english: Come to Bogey's party with me.
How would such a genie get out of the bottle?
sentences.chinese: 這樣一個妖怪如何能夠破石而出的呢？

definition: Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
White Bone Spirit (in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4])/(fig.) sly and cunning person
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
supernatural being (such as a demon, monster, ghost, spirit, gremlin etc)
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]
